name: Bombino
description: '''Omara "Bombino" Moctar''' (in [[Tifinagh]] ⴱⵓⵎⴱⵉⵏⵓ; born 1 January 1980) is a [[Tuareg]] singer-songwriter and guitarist from [[Niger]]. His music is sung in [[Tamasheq language|Tamasheq]] and often addresses Tuareg geopolitical concerns. Bombino is the subject of the documentary film ''[[Agadez, the Music and the Rebellion]]''.
